title: Yamaha Lube - Recommended
description: Good price for this preferred product.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022

title: No comparison
description:
Best oil period. You pay for it, but it is worth it. I have used this in my Yamaha 97 40hp since day 1. I also have a 2001 Merc 9.9 that says only use "Mercury approved oil" and I run Yamalune in that with no problems. Smokes alot less that anything else I have tried. Yamaha was at the top of the 2 stroke outboard performance charts before 4strokes took over and this is what powered them.
Spend the money, protect your motor and have it for a lifetime.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2020

title: Great product
description: It is what it is. Minimal smoke when used in my older Yamaha 40 HP 2 stroke oil injection engine. The price here is half the cost of what it would be at my local marina.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2021

title: Very Fast Delivery
description: I always use genuine Yamalube in my Yammy outboard. So I rate that 5 stars. But the company that sent it, Leaders RPM, was so prompt in shipping it that I got it 4 days before their estimate. Great product, great service.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021

title: Low smoke compared to non oem brands!
description: Gone through jugs of this all season on my 86 200hp Yamaha outboard...tried the Quicksilver brand bc I was in a time crunch. The difference was notable, smoked like crazy. Spend the extra money and enjoy tight lines without dying from fumes!
